Actions.Name: Razor Wind
Actions.Description: Repeat the following effect three times:
Actions.Effects: Dash 1, then deal 2 damage to all adjacent foes. Must move in the same direction.

Actions.Name: Gust
Actions.Description: The Dervish or an ally in range 2 may fly 2.

Actions.Name: Thousand Cuts
Actions.Description: Repeat the following effect four times:
Actions.Effects: Teleport 1, then deal 2 damage to all adjacent foes. Must teleport to a different space each time.
